text: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا جِئۡنَا لِنُفۡسِدَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كُنَّا سَٰرِقِينَ

translation.en: They said, "By Allah, you have certainly known that we did not come to cause corruption in the land, and we have not been thieves
translation.id: Mereka (saudara-saudara Yusuf) menjawab, "Demi Allah, sungguh, kamu mengetahui bahwa kami datang bukan untuk berbuat kerusakan di negeri ini dan kami bukanlah para pencuri
